price: [Sabe que] dos ángeles escriben todas sus obras, sentados uno a su derecha y el otro a su izquierda,
arabic: إِذۡ يَتَلَقَّى ٱلۡمُتَلَقِّيَانِ عَنِ ٱلۡيَمِينِ وَعَنِ ٱلشِّمَالِ قَعِيدٞ

version.title: Spanish Translation - Isa Garcia
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Spanish by Muhammad Isa Garcia - Printed in 1433 H.

meta.transliteration: idh yatalaqqā al-mutalaqiyāni ʿani al-yamīni waʿani al-shimāli qaʿīdun
